attributes.action: Allow Ken Livingstone and Naz Shah back into the labour party
attributes.background: Ken Livingstone, mayor of London from 2000-2008, and Naz Shah, Bradford West MP since May 2015, have been unfairly suspended from the Labour party under the false pretense that they are Anti-semetic. We demand that the Labour party re-consider this course of action and focus on real anti-semites!
